Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.defaults

Class DefaultReconnectFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.defaults.DefaultReconnectFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReconnectFilter
    public class DefaultReconnectFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReconnectFilter
    Default implementation of ReconnectFilter that uses ReconnectFilter.ConnectionLostPlease.retryInstantly() for the first reconnect attempt, and from then on uses the Interval rate passed to the constructor. An instance of this class is held in DefaultDeviceReconnectFilter, and DefaultServerReconnectFilter, to handle connection lost events ONLY. The logic is the same between the two, hence this class exists for this purpose, and to adhere to the DRY principle. This class is not meant for public consumption.

      • onConnectFailed

        public ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease onConnectFailed​(ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: ReconnectFilter
        This is called when connecting to a previously unconnected device fails. Use the static methods from ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease as return values to either retry, or stop retrying to connect.
